divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my house when i heard a jet that was obviously not a commercial jet rather a millatery sounding jet,so i went outside to look.I spotted the milletary jet shoot something at something leaving some kind of vaper trails or rocket trails of white smoke. then the milletary jet escorted another airplaine out of my sight.
